Class EventDAO

    Defines a data access object used for interactions with Event objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createEvent

        public java.lang.String createEvent(java.lang.String ownerID,
                                    java.lang.String instanceID,
                                    java.lang.String title,
                                    java.lang.String minilvl,
                                    java.lang.String description,
                                    java.lang.String eventTime)
        Creates a new Event in the EVENTS table using the passed parameters.
        Parameters:
        ownerID - The ID of the User who created the event.
        instanceID - The ID of the Instance in which the event will take place.
        title - The title of the Event.
        minilvl - The minimum item level required for a User to attend the Event.
        description - The description of the Event.
        eventTime - The time and date (yyyy-mm-dd hh-mi) of the Event.
        Returns:
        The ID of the created Event, or null if it could not be created.

      • getAllEvents

        public java.util.List<Event> getAllEvents()
        Returns a List of all the Events in the EVENTS table.
        Returns:
        A List of all Events in the EVENTS table.

      • getEventByID

        public Event getEventByID(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the Event object of a given Event ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Event.
        Returns:
        The Event object corresponding to the given Event ID.
